title: Ethnobotany and diversity of Citrus spp. (Rutaceae) as a source of “Kem-kem” traditional medicine used among the Karo sub-ethnic in North Sumatra, Indonesia
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Mulyati Rahayu, Titi Kalima, Merry Meryam Martgrita, Christine Sembiring, Lianty Simangunsong, Sion Elisabeth, Esti Munawaroh, Inggit Puji Astuti, Siti Susiarti, Parwa Oryzanti, Vera Budi Lestari Sihotang, Y. Purwanto, Muhamad Nikmatullah
